Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

question.title: What is the primary cause of facial paralysis in a patient with a central nervous system lesion?
question.description: A question about the underlying cause of facial paralysis in a patient with a central nervous system lesion

option_a.title: Infection or inflammation
option_a.description: A possible cause of facial paralysis, but not the primary cause in this context

option_b.title: Trauma or injury
option_b.description: A possible cause of facial paralysis, but not the primary cause in this context

option_c.title: Stroke or cerebral vasculitis
option_c.description: The primary cause of facial paralysis in a patient with a central nervous system lesion

option_d.title: Neurodegenerative disease
option_d.description: A possible cause of facial paralysis, but not the primary cause in this context

correct_option.title: C
correct_option.description: The letter corresponding to the correct option
